# EasyS order manager API

## Compatibility

### Django 4.2

Python 3.11 to 3.12
DRF 3.14 to 3.16

### Django 5.0

Python 3.11 to 3.12
DRF 3.14 to 3.16

### Django 5.1

Python 3.11 to 3.13
DRF 3.14 to 3.16

## Make a new release

`pipx run bump-my-version bump <patch|minor|major> --message="feat: release x, refs y`
